title: Gifting

replies.body: You should normally receive a notification of the item you've received as a gift so long as your connection to the servers is stable. Are you seeing a specific message or are you not receiving *any notifications* for gifts?

Whenever I receive a gift all it says to me is "Congratulations you've received a gift".
that's it. when I click the claim button it adds it to whatever and wherever.
It's weird.
I get the gift but it doesnt tell me what is in the gift.. in other words lol

Is this happening on the Beta Client or the Legacy Client? Also, has this happened every single time you've been gifted, not just when you've been sent a gift from Riot?

I'd like to see a [**screenshot**](https://gyazo.com/) if you happen to be gifted anytime soon.
I'll show you tonight.. I'll gift myself on my other acc.
